sense.gloss: to wind (of a road, etc.), to meander, to twist
to undulate, to surge, to swell, to roll, to billow

sdata.j: も|う↑寝↑↓ね↓る|↑時刻↑↓じこく↓ですよ。
sdata.e: It's time to go to bed.

sdata.j: も|う↑寝↑↓ね↓る|↑時間↑↓じかん↓です。ラジオを↑消↑↓け↓しなさい。
sdata.e: It's time to go to bed. Turn off the radio.

sdata.j: も|う↑寝↑↓ね↓る|↑時間↑↓じかん↓だぞ。
sdata.e: It's time you went to bed.

sdata.j: も|う↑寝↑↓ね↓る|↑時間↑↓じかん↓だぞ。
sdata.e: It is time to go to bed.
It is time to go to bed.

sdata.j: ↑子供↑↓こども↓↑達↑↓たち↓はも|う↑寝↑↓ね↓る|べき↑時間↑↓じかん↓だ。
sdata.e: It's high time the children went to bed.

sdata.j: も|う↑寝↑↓ね↓る|↑時間↑↓じかん↓です。ラジオを↑消↑↓け↓しなさい。
sdata.e: It is time you went to bed. Turn off the radio.

sdata.j: ジミー、も|う↑寝↑↓ね↓る|↑時間↑↓じかん↓ですよ。
sdata.e: It is time you went to bed, Jimmy.

sdata.j: あなたはも|う↑寝↑↓ね↓る|↑時間↑↓じかん↓でしょ。
sdata.e: It is high time you were in bed.

sdata.j: １１↑時↑↓じ↓になってるよ。おまえはも|うねる|↑時間↑↓じかん↓でしょ。
sdata.e: It's already eleven. It's high time you were in bed.
